abstract: The takeover of Millipore, a provider of purifiers and filters for laboratories, will give Merck a big presence in products for the biotechnology industry.
snippet: The takeover of Millipore, a provider of purifiers and filters for laboratories, will give Merck a big presence in products for the biotechnology industry.
lead_paragraph: Merck of Germany said on Sunday that it had agreed to buy Millipore, an American provider of purifiers and filters for biotechnology laboratories, for about $7.2 billion, including debt.

headline.main: Merck to Pay $7.2 Billion for Millipore
headline.print_headline: Merck to Pay $7.2 Billion For Millipore

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
